qas.question: In what concept is the MoD considered a leader?
Who was the PM of Britain in 2010?
Who was the president of France in 2010?
In which two countries is the UK installing military bases?
In which other country is the UK thinking about installing a military base?
What is France establishing in the Persian Gulf?
Where is France thinking about also putting air and naval bases?
What concept is France considered a leader in?
What did Oman sign with France?
What would the treaty allow Oman and France to do?

context: The MoD has since been regarded as a leader in elaborating the post-Cold War organising concept of <b7_0>"<a0_0>defence diplomacy<a0_0/>"<b7_0/>. As a result of the Strategic Defence and Security Review 2010, Prime Minister <a1_0>David Cameron<a1_0/> signed <b8_0>a 50-year treaty<b8_0/> with French President <a2_0>Nicolas Sarkozy<a2_0/> that would have the two countries <b9_0>co-operate intensively in military matters<b9_0/>. The UK is establishing <b5_0>air and naval bases<b5_0/> in the Persian Gulf, located in the <a3_0>UAE and Bahrain<a3_0/>. A presence in <a4_0><b6_0>Oman<b6_0/><a4_0/> is also being considered.
